title: Greek Roast Lamb and Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 large orange, juiced', '3 tablespoons dark French mustard', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 teaspoons dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '10 potatoes, peeled and cut into 5cm pieces', '1 (1.35kg) half leg of lamb, bone-in', '5 cloves garlic']
